title: We Are Limitless - 3rd Annual Celebrity Poker Tournament & Fundraiser
desc: This year's event will be bigger than ever with a GRAND PRIZE of 5 Nights at   in Costa Rica including airfare for two and $250 in Spa Treatments! Come join us along with this year's sponsor BURNING TORCH at Skyline 204 in Hollywood for a day in support of We Are Limitless and its work in Rwanda and Congo providing education and medical assistance for orphans -- giving them a chance at a limitless future.  Our goal for this years event is to raise $50,000 to continue to be able to offer tuition for boarding schools, medical services, clothing, and other basic needs. Currently we have 24 students in Rwanda ranging in age from 8-20 yrs old attending primary & secondary schools and universities. In Congo we are partners with local organization   in helping to provide food, housing and medical support to over 100 women and children who have been victims of the ongoing violence in East Congo. All donations are tax deductible to the extent permitted by applicable tax laws. For more information or to make a donation visit us at
